reason: Scalar multiplication not defined: As a *-algebra over C (presumably), the statement should specify how complex scalars act on elements. Must clarify: (1) Is there a scalar multiplication · : C × A_0 → A_0? (2) Does it satisfy λ(μa) = (λμ)a? (3) Does 1·a = a for scalar 1 ∈ C? (4) Compatibility with involution: (λa)* = λ̄a*?
